price: 74. Luudna Waxaanu siinnay garsoor wanaagsan iyo cilmi, Waxaana ka badbaadinnay magaaladii (Soodom) ee ahayd mid xumo20 fasha. Waxay ahaayeen qolo xun oo caasiyaal ah.
arabic: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗا وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِي كَانَت تَّعۡمَلُ ٱلۡخَبَٰٓئِثَۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمَ سَوۡءٖ فَٰسِقِينَ
footnotes: 20. Xumahaas oo ahaa shirki, gaalnimo, fuulitaanka ragga, khaniisnimo, tuugo, boob, dhac, jid gooyo, iwm iyagoo waxaasi oo idil u fali jiray si bareer ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan ātaynāhu ḥuk'man waʿil'man wanajjaynāhu mina al-qaryati allatī kānat taʿmalu al-khabāitha innahum kānū qawma sawin fāsiqīna
